headline: EFOS UV/VISIBLE SPOT CURE SYSTEM 250NM - 450NM
description: UV/Visible Spot Cure System    Efos Acticure A4000  Efos has been acquired by EXFO
categories.lvl2: Optical / Photonic Equipment  >  Lamps > Curing Lamps
specstable:
Manufacturer Efos
Model ACTICURE A4000
Description UV/Visible Spot Cure System
Lamp Type & Power Mercury Vapor Short Arc, 100W
Wavelength Minimum 250 nm
Wavelength Maximum 450 nm
Liquid Light Guide Included No
External Cooling Forced Air Cooled
Accessories

Light guide and filter not included(inquire regarding availability)

Other Information
  • Units are shipped with used working lamp


System Features and Specifications:

  • Spectral Output: 24,600 mW/cm2
  • Warm up 90 sec.
  • Panel Display
  • Lamp useage ( hrs )
  • Digital exposure time
  • Lamp on indicator
  • Shutter alarm
  • Intensity out indicator
  • Optional filters available from EFOS
Power Requirements 120/220 V 3.0 A 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Condition Excellent
Exterior Dimensions
Width 12.000 in (30.5 cm)
Depth 12.000 in (30.5 cm)
Height 6.000 in (15.2 cm)
Weight 15 lb (7 kg)
